properties.name: ara.scheduling.enable
properties.description: Enable all scheduled tasks (eg. defect indexing). False during integration tests. Prefer disabling individual schedulers in project settings instead of disabling this altogether.

properties.name: ara.defectSyncSchedulingDelayInMilliseconds
properties.description: The time (in milliseconds) between two periodic synchronizations of problem statuses from defect states. Must be positive.

properties.name: ara.defectSyncSchedulingInitialDelayInMilliseconds
properties.description: The time (in milliseconds) before the first periodic synchronization of problem statuses from defect states (to eg. not stress out server after startup).
